europeana:record.dc:title: Oswaldella vervoorti spec. nov. (Cnidaria: Hydrozoa), a new benthic hydroid from the South Shetland Islands, Antarctica
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Pe√±a Cantero A.L.
Garcia Carrascosa A.M.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Porifera, Coelenterata, Echinodermata, Brachyopoda
Cnidaria; Hydrozoa; hydroids; Kirchenpaueriidae; Oswaldella; new species; Antarctica.
europeana:record.dc:description: Oswaldella vervoorti spec. nov., a new antarctic hydroid is described and depicted. The differences and similarities with allied species in the genus, known only from the antarctic region, are discussed.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Oswaldella vervoorti spec. nov. (Cnidaria: Hydrozoa), a new benthic hydroid from the South Shetland Islands, Antarctica (URN:ISSN:0024-1652) (Volume 323) (Issue 15)
